  • Uses of Action in game.action

    Subclasses of Action in game.action
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  AttackAction
    Special Action for attacking other Actors.
    class  BreedAction
    Special Action breeds with an Actor
    class  BuyItemAction
    Represents an action to buy an item.
    class  DieFromNaturalCausesAction
    Special Action that shows a Dinosaur starving to death, or dying from dehydration
    class  DrinkFromWaterTileAction  
    class  EatFromGrowableAction
    Action that allows a Dinosaur to eat from a Growable
    class  EatItemAction
    Action that allows a Dinosaur to eat an Item from the Ground and heals a certain amount of hitpoints
    class  EatPreyAction
    Special Action that attacks an Actor, and heals the attacker Actor
    class  FeedAction
    Action that allows Player to feed an Item to a Dinosaur and heal it
    class  LayEggAction
    Special Action that allows a Dinosaur to lay an Egg.
    class  PickFruitAction
    Action that allows Player to attempt to pick a Fruit from a Growable.
    class  QuitGameAction
    Used to let player quit the game.
